Namespace Pipeline.Configuration

Classes

Action

An action is performed before or after a pipeline is run.

Current actions types are: copy, web, tfl, run, and open.

Copy: Copies a file from, to.

<actions>
    <add type="copy" from="c:\file1.txt" to="file2.txt"></add>
</actions>

Web: Executes a GET or POST (as determined by method) to a specified url.

  • If get, the web request result is stored in content, and is forwarded to the next action's content.
  • If post, content is posted to the url.
<actions>
    <add type="web" method="get" url="https://www.google.com?search=blah+blah+blah..."></add>
    <add type="web" method="post" content="blah blah blah..." url="https://www.google.com/index"></add>
</actions>

Tfl: Execute another pipeline as determined by either url, file, or content. 

<actions>
    <add type="tfl" url="https://config.com/cfg.xml"></add>
    <add type="tfl" file="c:\cfg.xml"></add>
    <add type="tfl" content="{ "processes":[ { "name":"process 1" } ]}"></add>
</actions>

Run: Runs a command against a connection.

<actions>
    <add type="run" connection="c1" command="update wo set status = 10 from worker wo where status = 9;"></add>
</actions>

Open: Opens a file.

<actions>
    <add type="open" file="c:\file1.xml"></add>
</actions>
